   18: 
   19: import dns.immutable
   20: import dns.rdtypes.euibase
   21: 
   22: 
   23: @dns.immutable.immutable
   24: class EUI64(dns.rdtypes.euibase.EUIBase):
   25:     """EUI64 record"""
   26: 
   27:     # see: rfc7043.txt
   28: 
   29:     byte_len = 8  # 0123456789abcdef (in hex)
   30:     text_len = byte_len * 3 - 1  # 01-23-45-67-89-ab-cd-ef
